title: Calories in 1/2 Cup Granulated Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in 1/2 cup granulated sugar: about 387 kcal from pure carbs, plus full nutrition breakdown, equivalents, and tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Standard white granulated sugar; 1/2 cup ≈ 100 g by volume (packed lightly, no sifting).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, granularity, packing density, and measurement; pure sucrose assumed. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1/2 cup granulated sugar contains ~387 kcal, entirely from carbohydrates (sugars).

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use powdered sugar (more volume, ~120 g per 1/2 cup)
Substitute with stevia (zero-calorie, per 100 g equivalent sweetness)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1/2 cup granulated sugar?

faqs.a: Yes, 100% carbohydrates (as sugars), with 0 g protein, fat, or fiber per 100 g.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1/2 cup?
faqs.a: About 100 g of sugars, equivalent to 25 teaspoons.

faqs.q: Does packing affect calories in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes; loosely packed 1/2 cup ≈ 90 g (348 kcal), firmly packed ≈ 110 g (426 kcal).
